meaningMnemonic: You’re all by your lonesome <radical>self</radical> and have to check your <radical>rice paddie</radical>s, all <radical>twenty</radical> of them! Luckily, you have the most astute of all <kanji>nose</kanji>s, allowing you to quickly assess the state of your twenty rice paddies all by yourself.
readingMnemonic: As you’re about to finish checking your paddies, your <kanji>nose</kanji> picks up an additional smell: It’s <reading>Hannah</reading>, bringing you a bunch of <reading>花</reading> (はな)!
